alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay and south central Duval Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 126 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeside, or near Orange Park, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Nas Jax, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Oakleaf Plantation, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Jacksonville Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
